name: Daum Profile Comment
author: Hyunseok Cho

sections.description: This is the long description. No limit, and you can use Markdown (as well as in the following sections).
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload whole folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Get your client id from https://dna.daum.net/myapi/affiliate/new?mode=login
  3. Put your $clientid in daum_comment.php
  4. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
What is Daum

Daum (Korean: 다음; KRX: 035720) is a web portal in South Korea, like Naver and Nate. Daum offers many Internet services to web users, including a popular free web-based e-mail, messaging service, forums, shopping and news.

Where can I get the client id

https://dna.daum.net/myapi/affiliate/new?mode=login

short_description: Social comments with Daum Profile API.
